org.safs.android.engine.processor

Class HighLightUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.safs.android.engine.processor.HighLightUtil

  • public class HighLightUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Purpose: Help to highlight a view.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HighLightUtil(DSAFSTestRunner runner, View view) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean clearHighLight() 
      Drawable createHighLightedBackground(View view)
      Create a LayerDrawable as highlighted background.
      void debug(java.lang.String message) 
      boolean highLight()
      Try to highlight a view.
      First try to highlight by placing a PopupWindow over the view.
      If PopupWindow fails to show, we will try to modify the background of the view to highlight.
      void setView(View view)

    • Method Detail

      • setView

        public void setView(View view)

      • highLight

        public boolean highLight()
        Try to highlight a view.
        First try to highlight by placing a PopupWindow over the view.
        If PopupWindow fails to show, we will try to modify the background of the view to highlight.

      • clearHighLight

        public boolean clearHighLight()

      • debug

        public void debug(java.lang.String message)

      • createHighLightedBackground

        public Drawable createHighLightedBackground(View view)
        Create a LayerDrawable as highlighted background. This LayerDrawable will contain a ShapeDrawable created with RectangleShape. If the parameter view's background is not null, then LayerDrawable will contain it.
        See Also:
        RectangleShape
